summary: Fort Worth is the fifth largest city in Texas.
full_text: Kinney County is a county located in the U.S. state of Texas. As of the 2010 census, its population was 3,598. Its county seat is Brackettville. The county was created in 1850 and later organized in 1874. It is named for Henry Lawrence Kinney, an early settler.
title: Kinney County, Texas
